name: Eagle
content:
Traits

**Keen Sight**: The eagle has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

 Actions

**Talons**: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.
